name: geraldin-bot
description: Bot para sinalizar parceiros por WhatsApp quando recebem pedido no Geraldo <aiqfome>
author: Renan D.

scripts.prebuild: npm config set PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=true && rm -rf ../dist && rm -rf ../geraldin-bot.v%npm_package_version%.zip && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm install
scripts.postbuild: cp package.json package-lock.json LICENSE .env.ini.example README.md ../dist && mv ../dist/.env.ini.example ../dist/.env.ini && npm run zip
